00074     inline Int_t KTSimpleFFT::GetTimeSize() const
00075     {
00076         return fTransform->GetSize();
00077     }
00078 
00079     inline Int_t KTSimpleFFT::GetFrequencySize() const
00080     {
00081         return fTransform->GetSize() / 2 + 1;
00082     }
00083 
00084     inline void KTSimpleFFT::SetTimeSize(Int_t nBins)
00085     {
00086         delete fTransform;
00087         fTransform = new TFFTRealComplex(nBins, kFALSE);
00088         fIsInitialized = kFALSE;
00089         fIsDataReady = kFALSE;
00090         return;
00091     }
